short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will help you to save and load your prompt easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Introducing a Chrome extension that will boost your productivity in style!

Here are the key features of this cool tool:

💾 Save or load your prompts with ease. All of this is possible with just a few clicks.
✅ To add or update your prompt, simply click on the appropriate directory.
🎚️ Each directory page displays only ten prompts at a time for clean management.
🗑️ Deleting a directory is only possible on the directory's detail page, a feature designed to prevent unintended deletion.
📁 Effortlessly drag your prompts to any directory where you wish to move them.
